com.linecorp.armeria.server.throttling

Class ThrottlingService<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.DecoratingService<I,O,I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.SimpleDecoratingService<I,O>
        • com.linecorp.armeria.server.throttling.ThrottlingService<I,O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<I,O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThrottlingHttpService, ThrottlingRpcService

    public abstract class ThrottlingService<I extends Request,O extends Response>
extends SimpleDecoratingService<I,O>
    Decorates a Service to throttle incoming requests.
